regs

The saved registers for when an interrupt occurs unsigned int gs, fs, es, ds; - segment registers pushed onto the stack unsigned int edi, esi, ebp, ebx, edx, ecx, eax; - general purpose registers pushed onto the stack unsigned int int_no, err_code; - interrupt number and error code unsigned int eip, cs, eflags; - address of instruction which caused the exception, saved code segment, and flags
